California Installation Expertise

Coastal Weather Considerations

California coastal areas require specialized weatherproofing due to salt air exposure. Our technicians use marine-grade sealants and corrosion-resistant hardware.

Wildfire Season Planning

During wildfire season, we provide rapid reinstallation services and temporary ground mounts if roof installations are compromised.

Seismic Safety Compliance

All California installations meet seismic safety requirements with flexible mounting systems designed for earthquake zones.

Solar Panel Integration

Expert integration with existing solar panel systems, ensuring optimal placement for both energy generation and satellite connectivity.
